::Battera::

She heard the pounding on the door.  She thought for a it was Zardus 
here to beat her for being so disrespectful to him. She stormed to 
the door and threw it open, "LOOK I HAVE JUST ABOUT HAD ENOUgh...."
She stopped and stared at Cybershark. She couldn't believe her own 
eyes.  There was CyberShark, standing in her doorway looking back at 
her.  Suddenly a flood of emotions from her part with filled her.  
Her legs felt weak and she almost fell.  She hung onto the door and 
looked at him. "CyberShark? It's really you?" She still couldn't 
believe her eyes.  She took a step forward and put her arms around 
him and embraced him.  Her spark as she felt his in her arms.  A few 
tears rolled down her cheek,"Oh by the Matrix I have missed you."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     Still having no room of his own he was wondering what the 
blazes was going on. He looked around the hallways and noticed things 
that could be cameras, or sensors. Cloaking was no a good idea.
>     Just after that he heard a fist slam into a bulkhead. He came 
running. He turned a corner and saw Battera just as she went into her 
room.
>     "She's here!" CyberShark said. Many of the past emotion flooded 
his systems and his eyes went back to blue. He then realized that he 
had to play the good little solider for the time being, his eyes went 
to crimson again. He walked to the door and pounded on it. "Battera, 
it's me."
